initDatabase

public void initDatabase()
Create the database to store plugin settings. This method creates the ebean.properties file. It's not strictly necessary, but it silences a bukkit error message.

onCommand

public boolean onCommand(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                         org.bukkit.command.Command command,
                         String commandLabel,
                         String[] args)
The main command handler. Bukkit calls this to pass commands into the plugin.

Specified by:
onCommand in interface org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor
Overrides:
onCommand in class org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
Parameters:
sender - The sender, Usually a player. It could be the console, but that is not supported by this plugin.
command - The command to execute
commandLabel - The command Alias used to execute this command
args - All the args past to the command
Returns:
Parse Success

onDisable

public void onDisable()
Turnoff and cleanup the plugin. sets shutdown flag Signs all users out of IRC

onEnable

public void onEnable()
Turns on the plugin. Signs all users into IRC sets shutdown flag to false. parses config file. registers events with bukkit.
